boat.full_description:
'Elinor' underwent a major restoration in 2013 including: shotblasted entire hull and 2 pack paint, new main and secondary bowsprits and staysail boom. Masts sanded and varnised, new staysail, all over boat covers, painted inside, new galley, anodes, standing rigging and dead eyes.

Her sailing area includes the English East Coast, Brightlingsea, Medway and Ramsgate with trips across the Channel to France.

At the Swale Match, 2017, she won the Best Boat Cup.
boat.name: Elinor
boat.short_description: 'Elinor' is a replica of an American 2 masted line fishing boat circa 1870. The design was considered quick at the time, and used by smugglers.
